doc:
Florence Lee (born 1864) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Florence_Lee_(born_1864) 0 Florence Lee (1864–1933) was an American silent era actress who appeared in over 90 films between 1911 and 1931. She is perhaps best known to modern audiences for her last film role, that of the blind girl's grandmother in Charlie Chaplin's City Lights (1931). She also appeared in some Our Gang movies during the 1920s. Florence_Lee ( 1864 – 1933 ) was an_American_silent_era_actress who appeared in over_90_films between 1911_and_1931 . She is_perhaps_best_known to modern_audiences for her_last_film_role , that of the_blind_girl 's_grandmother in Charlie_Chaplin 's_City_Lights_(_1931_) . She also appeared in some_Our_Gang_movies during the_1920s .
